settings.title: Flexikitch Finance Products
settings.content:
We believe in the Australian dream of business ownership
and we endeavour to provide you with the right tools without
compromising your financial freedom.

settings.title: Your Full Service Hospitality Financier
settings.content:
We've built our philosophy around sharing risk and supporting our customers' businesses as they change and grow.

Running a hospitality business is no simple task, and we want to help you on the journey. We pride ourselves on finding you the right solutions for your business, and our finance product is developed with this one goal in mind. We aim to provide you with a solution that does not impede your financial freedom.

settings.title: What is the minimum rental period?
settings.answer: Flexikitch Finance works with a 12-month minimum term. After that stage, you can continue to rent &ndash and after 3 years of continuous rental you will own the equipment outright.

settings.title: What equipment can I finance?
settings.answer:
Any equipment that is serialised within the hospitality industry, and has an invoice value above $3,000.

We may limit our standard inclusions for specialised and/or high value appliances

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I change equipment at any time?
settings.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade equipment at any time, allowing you the flexibility to grow your business.

settings.title: What happens if equipment breaks down?
settings.answer: We provide all Flexikitch Rentals with ongoing breakdown servicecover for the lifetime of contract. It’s vital to us that you have a seamless experience, and that is why we have decided to extend service cover past the manufacturer’s warranty for the lifetime of rental.

settings.title: How do I get started?
settings.answer:
Complete the form at this link and one of sales team will get in touch with you.

Alternatively, head over to this link for pre-approval on finance for equipment up to $20 000 or contact us on 1300 769 161.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
